code: import React from"react";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{useLocalStorage}from"../../../hooks/useLocalStorage";import{addLittlePauseAction,deleteLittlePauseAction,setLittlePauseTimeAction}from"../../../store/timeReducer";import InputSetting from"../../../UI/InputSetting/InputSetting";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var DefaultLitlePauseSetting=function DefaultLitlePauseSetting(props){var dispatch=useDispatch();var time=useSelector(function(state){return state.time.littleBreak;});useLocalStorage("SETTING:LITTLE_PAUSE_TIME",time.minutes,setLittlePauseTimeAction);var addLittlePause=function addLittlePause(){if(time.minutes<30)dispatch(addLittlePauseAction(1));};var removeLittlePause=function removeLittlePause(){if(time.minutes>1)dispatch(deleteLittlePauseAction(1));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputSetting,{add:addLittlePause,remove:removeLittlePause,value:time.minutes,tittle:props.tittle});};export default DefaultLitlePauseSetting;
